name: HEXOHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on HEXO smart device.”
”Alexa, turn off HEXO smart device.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Interact with HEXO smart device by Alexa. 
To get started, make sure you have "HEXO Home" and "Alexa" APP ready for operation in your phone. Then, you just need to enable the "HEXO Home" smart home skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your "HEXOHome" account. 

When all connection is ready built, you can control HEXO device by saying: 

"Alexa, turn on HEXO smart device."
"Alexa, turn off HEXO smart device."

You must change the words "HEXO smart device" to your device name.

Commands compatible with HEXO vacuum cleaner.

Tips: you must firstly bind your smart device with “HEXO Home” APP to use the Alexa voice control. 
Please make sure to use your “HEXO Home” account to link Alexa skill. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us: support@proscenic.com
